inn1.comm: runs right away. Tip and run. Jayasuriya tapped a back-of-length delivery close on the off side and off he went for that single.
swinging outside the off stump and left alone.
short of length and again some swing. But the length is too short to trouble the batsman. Enough time to see the movement and leave it alone
short of length again, this time holds its line outside off stump and Sangakkara withdraws his bat and lets the ball sail past him
fuller, on the middle and driven to mid-on
angled across Sangakkara, full in length and its run down to third man for a single
tad wide outside off stump, some swing again but too early and too wide to interest the batsman. Left alone.
short of length, good bounce as it shapes in a touch outside off and Sangakkara goes back to punch it to deep backward point.
full in length, opens the bat face and guides to cover point
swing and a miss. Short of length and width offered outside off, Sangakkara went for it , a big swish but no wood on leather.
closer to the off stump, a tad fuller and pushed to covers

Oh he has cleaned him up. The off stump has been pegged back. Sangakkara looks stunned. It landed around a length, outside off stump and seamed back in. Sangakkara had a lazy waft, without moving towards the line and the bat came down outside the line. He even lost the bottom-hand grip of the bat handle and that took the bat further away from the ball.
gets forward to push to covers
lands well outside off and stays there, Dhoni gathers
outside the off stump, moving away, left alone
fuller, swings from the middle towards off and middle and Jayasuriya takes a half-step forward, waits for the movement before pushing it to the off side
short of length again and Jayasuriya goes right back to defend cautiously to the on side of the pitch.
on a length, around the middle stump line, defended to the on side
leans forward to push a length delivery to point region
good bounce and carry. It hit the short of length and moved away, left alone by the batsman

shout for lbw as the ball hit him high on the back thigh. It moved away from the leg and middle line towards the middle, Mahela thought it would angle further away from him and had got his bat well outside the line.
slanted across Mahela who, this time, pushes inside the line.
gets forward to defend a length delivery to the off side. Good over, this.
inside edged past the stumps. Jayasuriya went at the width offered but went too hard at it and edged it past the off stump and rolls over to Dhoni
this one curves away from Jayasuriya who has a waft outside off and Dhoni collects
lands on a length around middle and moves towards off and middle, defended down the track
goes for the inswing to the left-handed Jayasuriya. It slips to the middle and leg line, Jaya picked it up, shuffled quickly to play a delicate leg glance
back to the outside off line and is left alone. Two slips waiting for a mistake.
holding its line around the off stump, Jayasuriya plays a compact looking defensive stroke to covers
probing delivery around that off stump angling across and Mahela adjusts to push it to the off side
full and straight on the middle, Mahela leans forward to defend with the full face of the bat. Tuk Tuk cricket.
fuller and Mahela caresses it through extra cover. He leaned forward and opened the bat face at the last minute to find the gap.

Zaheer strikes with his full length and probing line around the off stump. Mahela gets forward, hangs his bat out in an effort to defend but the ball kept angling away, kissed the outside edge and flew towards the first slip. Dhoni had a half-hearted attempt at the catch before collapsing his knees and not getting in the way. The ball went to Yuvraj who juggled a bit but held on. 10 for 2.
straighter, on the off and middle line, pushed down the track

Zaheer is on a roll. The angling delivery works again. It landed on a length around off stump and shaped away a touch. Chamara had a poke. Fatal. Thin nick through to Dhoni. The slip fielders jump in joy, Dhoni flings the ball high in the air and Zaheer rushes to him. 10 for 3 and the Sri Lanka are wobbling here.
Praveen sees the light and gets this one to ping the full length. It curves away from Jayasuriya, who has been patience personified so far, lets it alone.
around the off stump line and defended to the off side
back to short of length, outside off and holding its line, left alone again.
curving in from back of length, on the middle, turned past square leg
full but well outside the off stump and Silva watches Dhoni collect the ball

Praveen joins in the party hosted by Zaheer. It landed back of length around the middle stump line, Silva is sucked forward, bat way in front of the body and the ball curves away with bounce to take the shoulder of the bat and popping to point. 11 for 4 and Sri Lanka are reeling here.
full and moving from the middle towards the leg stump line, misses the flick and it runs away of the pad
beaten outside off. The two slips watched eagerly as Dilshan pushed inside the line of a length delivery that left him late.
angling further away from Dilshan who offers no stroke.
full in length, lands outside off, moves away with the angle, Dilshan lets Dhoni come into play.
around the off stump and Dilshan opens the blade to run it to third man
Jayasuriya continues to show the best defense so far. Moves towards the line of a length delivery, bat and pad close together, head over the ball as he defends.
drifts to the leg stump line, tries to jab it away, misses but will pick up a leg bye
lands outside off stump and moves away, Jayasuriya shoulders arms. How long will he remain patient?
in that zone outside off stump and Jayasuriya lets it go past him.
comes back in from short of length, on the middle and off, pushed to mid-off

pushes the short-of-length delivery towards mid-on, Dilshan sets off for a run but Jayasuriya, who responded initially, changed his mind as he saw Praveen go after it and dive. Praveen missed the ball and it rolled to mid-on but his effort and dive prevented the single
lands on a length around middle, curves away, jabbed to the off side
slightly short of length and the ever-busy Dilshan went for the pull, misses and is hit on the groin. Ouch.
slanted across him, pushed to left of backward point where Kohli makes a diving stop
outside the off stump line, left alone
gets forward to defend a length delivery to the off side
fuller, on the middle stump line, holding its line, pushed down to mid-on
another attempt to pull but again not all that short and it strikes the thigh.
leans forward to defend a full length delivery down the track
outside the off stump, tapped to third man for a single

Dilshan is an attacking batsman and will keep going for his shots. This time, he went hard at a cover drive and edged it to the ground and it collided with the back of the bat as it completed the arc!
Short of length and Dilshan goes for the pull shot but hits it to mid-on. He is going for the counterattack.
Ah there he breaks free. Short-pitched delivery and Dilshan plays a lovely pull shot for a boundary.
even better. He leaned forward to unfurl a sweetly-timed extra cover drive. It was a length delivery and he didn't try to hit it hard as early in the over. Just a firm push. No violence.
Jayasuriya is contend to defend and see out this phase.
on the pads, clipped to fine leg for a single
short of length, on the middle stump, wants to pinch a single but his tap takes the ball straight to midwicket. he wanted to place it between midwicket and mid-on
lands just outside off, goes away, Dilshan covers the off stump and gets his bat out of the way of the ball.
Lovely timing from Dilshan. He moved forward to wrist a full length delivery on the middle and leg through wide midwicket. Nice.
shout for lbw as the ball nips back in from outside off to beat the defensive waft but strikes him high on the pad.
short of length, bounces as it holds its line around middle and leg, turned to square leg
short in length again, just outside the off stump, Jayasuriya goes back and across to play a solid defensive stroke to the off side
fuller, on the middle but Jayasuriya is not tempted to go for any big shot, puts his head down to tap the ball to covers
he goes for his short-arm pull this time, though. It was slightly short of length, on the middle and leg and Jayasuriya swiveled to get it past square leg.
full in length, straight on the off stump line, Dilshan moves forward to push it to covers
punched to mid-off
gets solidly behind the line of a length delivery around the off stump to defend

Jayasuriya shows the first signs of trying to manufacture shots. He walked down the track, moving to the leg side but Zaheer saw him coming, shortened the length and pinged his body, Jaya adjusted to jab it to the off side
short in length and pulled to long leg for a single
lands just outside leg stump, holds its line, bounces from short of length to beat the glance across the line and rolls of the thigh pad

It cut in from outside the off stump, Jayasuriya was caught on the shuffle, trying to defend and was hit in front of the stumps but high around the front-pad flap. It looked like going over. Will confirm after replays. Zaheer has struck the most vital blow of the day. The virtual eye suggests it would have hit the top of the middle stump. Right at the top. So that's that. Jayasuriya is back in the hutch.
cuts in from outside off stump, defended down the track
around the off stump, pushed to mid-off
short of length and Dilshan goes for his pull shot, mistimes it past square leg
spanking off drive to resume proceedings. Full pitched and outside off and Kulasekara creamed it to left of mid-off
lands full outside off and shaped away, left alone.
short of length and good bounce and carry as it cut away past the batsman
length delivery around the middle stump line, defended to the off side of the pitch
fuller, lands outside off, comes in, left alone and it curves further in after it passed the stumps and Dhoni had to dive to his left to collect that.
outside the off stump, again leaving Dilshan who lets it go by
lands on a length around the off stump, shapes away, left alone
beaten comprehensively. It landed around the leg stump and moved towards the off. Dilshan tried to tuck it to the on side and was squared up and the ball went right over the off stump.
gets forward and plays with the angle to backward point
outside the off stump, left alone
overpitched on the iff stump line and Kulasekara, who had smashed a earlier delivery through wide mid-off, creams this one past the non-striker.

huge huge shout for lbw from the Indians. It cut in from a length outside off , beat the waft and hit the back pad right in front.of the off stump. The umpire perhaps thought it had hit the bat. There was no edge, though. Hold on the umpires are on the walkie talkie. It can't be about the decision, can it. No reviews here. Anyway game resumes. Kulasekara is lucky to survive there
leans forward to defend
lets a length delivery whizz past him and to Dhoni
gets behind the line of a length delivery to defend to the on side of the pitch
curves it in towards middle, tucked to square leg

What a first ODI catch to take! Badrinath is the man. Dilshan pulled the short-of-length delivery in the air in front and right of long leg. Badri charged in and dived to hold on to it. Ala Dean Jones. Dilshan promises to deceive. Sri Lanka are tottering here. Unbelievable.
edge but falls well short of Dhoni. Kulasekara went for the square cut but gets the bottom edge
short of length, on the middle stump line, turned behind square leg
beaten outside off stump. Teasing delivery in the zone outside off, lame poke
pitched on off, defended back to bowler
pitched on off, Kulasekara inside-edges on to the pads
pitched outside off,Kulasekara gets forward and defends
shorter delivery, left alone
pitched on off and Kulasekara presents a straight bat to it in defence
pitched just outside off and the batsman is beaten in line. Lucky not to edge that
pitched outside off and moves away off the pitch, Thushara leaves it alone
pitched outside off and moves too far out for the first wide of the innings
pitched outside off, Thushara pushed it to point
pushed to point
one more wide as Pathan goes down the legside
pushed to Raina at cover
pitched on middle and defended to off side
pitched on off and defended to cover
beaten outside off again. Deja vu. What is happening out there? This is not such a bowler-friendly wicket to be 6 down for less than 50.
SL crawl past 50 with a fortuitous inside edge to fine-leg boundary. It did keep a touch low. It's a two-paced track.
cutting away from the off stump, left alone
gets forward to defend
another inside edge but this time just a single to fine leg
short in length, outside the off stump, pushed wide of mid-off for a single
on a length, around middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
back of length and again turned to midwicket
fuller, outside off, tries to flay it down the ground and it runs of the inner half of the bat to mid-on
short of length, on the hips, tucked to the on side
short of length, slanted across him who squeezes it to third man for a single
tries to dab a length delivery to the off side and edges it to the on side
short of length, on the middle and leg, tries to waft it to the leg side and it runs of the pad to the on side.
short of length, around the off stump, steered to backward point
short in length again, on the off and middle line, defended to covers
short of length outside off stump, punched to point
fuller, aiming for the yorker but falling short of the blockhole, on the legs, tucked to long leg
Slam. Cross court forehand drive. It was full and just outside off stump, he bent his knee to crash it past the surprised bowler
outside the off stump, angling away, run down to third man
back of length, on the middle stump line, tapped close on the leg side for a single
bouncer and Kulasekara goes down under without any fuss.
length delivery around the off stump, defended to mid-off
slightly short of length, pushed towards wide midwicket for a single, wild throw from Badrinath at the non-striker's end
short and well outside the off stump and the batsman punches it up and over extra cover.
turns to middle stump, turned to square leg
full and down the leg side, misses the flick but makes sure his back foot remains inside the creae - Dhoni had taken the bails off
Dropped It turned in slightly from outside off, bounced, Kulasekara pushed inside the line and it went of the shoulder of the bat to the right of Rohit Sharma at slip but he couldn't hold on.
turned to the on side for a single
really full and outside off, goes for the drive, the ball goes under the bat and to Dhoni
turns past the off stump, left alone by Thushara
full in length, on the middle stump line, angling away, driven to mid-off
short of length, outside off stump, punched to right of point where Virat Kohli makes a diving half stop, the ball rolls to cover point fielder

fuller, outside off stump, square driven uppishly in the air through cover point to the deep point man. Raina was just pushed back from the cover point position after the previous delivery. Had he stayed in he would have got the catch. But then, perhaps, the batsman would not have gone for the shot. We would never know.
bouncer and Thushara ducks

fuller and around the off stump and Thushara Mirando lofts it over mid-off. And Harbhajan makes a mess at the ropes. He pulled the ball in before stepping out of the ropes. He then gets his left foot over and inside the arean, picks the ball up but has his right foot still planted outside the boundary! Harbhajan had stepped on a bottle that was lying outside the ropes, nearly stumbled, recovered and turned back. Perhaps, that upset his concentration
outside the off stump, he has a poke and is beaten.
outside off stump, slow through the air, defended to the off side
spins down leg side and Dhoni can't get across in time. Yuvraj rushes back to pull it just from the ropes
flighted outside off, turns away, left alone
flighted on the stumps, driven to wide mid-on
leans forward to defend and the ball spins past the bat
floated full on the middle, squeezed past square leg
well outside the off stump and Doctrove extends his arms
lands full outside off stump, Thushara shapes to defend but the ball goes on with the angle and past the outside edge
slightly short and width outside off, cut to left of deep point
gets forward to push a flighted delivery to cover point for a single
just outside the off stump and eased to the off side of the pitch
drifts in to beat the defensive waft and strikes the pad. Half-hearted shout for lbw. Perhaps there was a inside edge or may be it was going down. Yuvraj didn't appeal convincingly
outside off stump, turns away, left alone
flat and quick, outside off and Tushara watches Dhoni gather
slower, outside off, pushed to backward point
quick and short of length, Thushara waited, played it late so that he can cut to the left of backward point and to the boundary. Good shot.
shout for lbw as Thushara misses the sweep and is hit on the back thigh in front of off. It pitched outside leg stump and was spinning past the off stump
plays in the v, back to the bowler
slow through the air, floated full around off, driven to long-off for a single
outside off, full and square driven to deep point for a single. More a steer than a drive.
comes in with the arm, slow from short of length, jabbed to point region for a single that brings up the 50 of the partnership. Kulasekara and Thushara are doing the job for Sri Lanka
leans forward to push a flighted delivery back to the bowler
quicker, lands on the leg and middle, moves towards middle and off, jabbed down the track
slower and bit more air, Thushara eases it to right of long-off for couple of runs.
flighted around off and middle, slow through the air, driven to long-on for a single
quicker, shorter and outside off. Thushara, like he did in the previous over, waits before cutting it late  and to the right of backward point.
flighted full around the off stump, driven to long off
spins down leg side and another wide
turns to the middle and leg line, turned to square leg for a single
the tall Thushara crouches in his stance and gets forward to push the flighted ball through the cover point gap
lands on the middle and leg, spins, worked to square leg
Thushara welcomes PK with a lofted shot to wide midwicket boundary. He thrust his front foot out and swung the short of length delivery over the infield
on the hips, turned behind square leg for a single
the bouncer and Kulasekara ducks. Dhoni gathers and applauds.
cutting in a touch, around middle and off, again from short of length, pushed to the on side of the pitch and Kumar gets across to pick the ball
banged in short and Kulasekara mistimes a pull past square leg
another short-pitched delivery, Thushara goes for the pull but doesn't connect.
leans forward to defend a flighted off break
slower, bit more air, turning down leg side, tickled to fine leg region
leans forward to drive to wide mid-off for a single
over spin on the ball, short of length, outside off stump, edges the square cut but it lands between backward point and short third man
gets on the front foot to push the ball to the on side of the pitch
lands around off and middle and spins down leg. Wide.
turns in from outside off, gets the inside edge on the defensive stroke and runs to fine leg

PK gets the vital breakthrough with a lovely slower ball. It was full and around the off stump, Thushara, who hit the first ball of Praveen Kumar in the previous over for a boundary, again went for the swing across the line but holed out to Kohli at deep midwicket.
jumps from short of length, jabbed to the on side
leans forward to drive to mid-off
PK strikes again. Another slower ball. Kulasekara is early into the on drive, couldn't keep it down and Badrinath fell forward from his short midwicket position to take the catch
leans forward to push to covers
edged to third man boundary. It was full and around the off and middle, squeezed through the vacant slip region.
Flighted doosra on the middle, Mendis, India's nemisis, didn't pick it up, tried to work it across the line and gets a leading edge back to Harbhajan.
leans forward to squeeze to the on side
leans forward to drive to mid-off region
from round the stumps, homing in on the off stump, run down to third man
Zaheer takes the PK route and bowls the slower one. The off cutter from round the stumps and it broke away sharply past the outside edge
leans forward to jab a length delivery through midwicket
smashes the length delivery to long-on
full and outside off, steered past backward point for a single
125.3 kmph bouncer and Murali manages to evade it by tumbling over to the leg side and has  a big smile
another short-pitched delivery, Murali opens his stance and goes for the pull but misses
another bouncer at the body and Muralitharan falls over to the leg side to get away from it. Again that big smile!
Ah! there he has his revenge. Fullish, on the stumps, Murali backed away to slice it in the air and to the left of mid-off
fullish, just outside off, guided to backward point
cutting away from the off stump, Fernando tries to dab it to third man and is beaten
another off cutter, Dilhara backs away a touch to partly steer it partly edge it past the diving Dhoni. No slips in place.
slower one well outside the off stump. Wide
full and on the middle and leg, turned to wide midwicket for a single
another bouncer to Murali, on the leg stump line and he ducks
slower one, full , early into the drive and chips it in the air but well short of long-off
short of length, Murali has a swipe across the line but misses
gets the inside edge with the swipe this time, on to the pad and it rolls over to the off side
full in length, on the middle, backs away to push to covers for a quick single
beaten by the slower one. It landed short of length and bounced over the stumps Murali was trying to his across the line
Yet another slower ball and again early into the drive but the ball falss short of mid-off
Ah! another slower one, again beaten but the ball teases past the off stump. PK can't believe it, shakes his head before walking off.
leans forward to push to the off side
floater outside off, left alone
Sri Lanka fold up for 142. Fernando skipped down the track and holed out to deep midwicket.

inn2.comm: full in length and on the middle stump line, holds its line, pushed back down the track
edged but falls short of second slip. It cut away from short of length, Irfan pushed his bat out and got a thick edge
leans forward to drive a full delivery to covers
straightens after landing on a length around middle stump, squeezed to square leg
gets forward to defend a full length delivery outside off stump
full in length outside off stump, run down to third man for a single
angling delivery outside off stump, Kohli shoulders arms
gets forward to defend a length delivery to the off side
lands outside off and moves even further away. Wide.
again well outside off, left alone.
closer to the off stump and Kohli takes a half-step forward to defend
another wide called. Looks slightly harsh. It landed outside off and moved away. Thushra was surprised by the call.
beaten on the flirt. Kohli sparred at a length delivery moving away from him.
gets close to the length delivery around off and steers to backward point
beaten outside off stump. Irfan chased the delivery that left him late
landed outside leg, held its line to strike Irfan on the pad. They ask the question  but not out
having beaten a few times, Irfan decides to counterattack. He skipped down the track and sliced the ball over mid-off. Not well timed but he will take it. Risky, though.

Kulasekara takes out his man. He had Irfan in trouble on a few occasions and gets the reward now. It left the lefty Irfan Pathan - the in cutter to the right hand batsman - and got the edge on its way. Sangakkara didn't move his left leg but just dived to take the catch.
fuller, on the middle stump line, turned to square leg
full again, around the off stump, Raina presses forward to defend but pushes his bat a touch outside the line and edges it on to his pad
slashed over first slip. Thushara got some bounce from short of length delivery and Kohli went after the width and got a thick edge
on the middle stump line, off a length, defended back down the track
full in length, just outside the off stump, dabbed to third man for a single
on the hips, tucked behind square leg
angling away from Kohli who shoulders arms. Two slips waiting rather eagerly for a mistake. Kohli has kept them interested with his flirts
presses back to push a back-of-length delivery to extra cover
cutting into Kohli who will pick up a leg bye. Beaten by the bounce and movement.

Caught plumb in front. Raina takes a tiny hesitant prod forward, tries to get his bat around the pad and is struck right in front. It landed on the middle and leg, cut in to hit the pad. Loose technique on offer by all the three Indians so far.
stays back to jab a full length delivery to the off side
almost a replica of Suresh Raina dismissal. Again that tiny step forward - nothing movement - and the bat comes down late and he manages to get a inside edge on to his pad
short of length outside off,  Kohli mistimes a punch-drive back to the bowler
better stride out and defends a length delivery to covers
leans forward to defend to the off side
almost got through his defenses. It skidded towards the middle stump, the bat was pushed outside the line and edges it to the on side. Game on here!
the off break this time and a hesitant Yuvraj picks it off the wicket to jab it to the off side
another off break, fuller this time and Yuvraj defends on the front foot
full and around off, square driven to point
attacking the middle and leg, skidding on, squeezed to square leg
edged over slips. Slightly short of length and cutting from the leg line and Yuvraj goes for a rather ambitious pull and top edges it over the slip cordon. Bishop drawls, "What sort of shot is that?"
holding its line around off and middle, pushed to the off side of the pitch
lands full on a length around off and shapes away a touch, Kohli gets across to defend to the off side. He is being slowly pushed towards off by the bowler.
And as expected this one cuts back in but Kohli is alert, doesn't shuffle across and wrists it past square leg
another one shaping in, Kohli works it to short midwicket
shifts his line to outside off, full in length, driven to mid-off
136 kmph length delivery shaping away from the off stump, left alone by Yuvraj
just outside off stump line, Yuvraj jabs it away to the off side.
homing in on the off stump and Yuvraj gets behind the line to push to mid-off
fuller and Yuvraj is caught on the back foot, tries to flick it away but misses and is struck on the pad. Going down leg, though
beaten outside off stump. The feet are glued to each other, the bat is pushed out away from the body and the ball rushes past the edge
slightly short in length, punched to mid-off
lands on a length around off, holds its line, pushed to mid-off
131.3 kmph bouncer and Kohli lets it pass over him
beaten on the flash. The urge to drive on the up, having batted in docile tracks at home is difficult to let go. Kohli took a short step forward and had a swish
on a length, around the off stump, pushed to mid-off
edge but short of the diving slip. A short step forward and again he goes for the on-the-up ambitious drive and gets the edge but doesn't carry to Mahela
full in length, straight, worked to short midwicket
angling in towards the off stump, Yuvraj stays back to push to the off side
breaks free with the punchy drive through covers. It was well short of length and that allowed him to press back, stand tall to punch it away
immediately Tushara pings the full length and Yuvraj is beaten on the lame prod..
shout for a catch behind as Yuvraj missed a pull shot. It brushed the waist en route to Sangakkara

again well short of length, not the length to bowl when the batsman is struggling on the full length repeatedly - and Yuvraj pulls it through wide midwicket. As a surprise weapon fine, but done too often this over
bangs it short of length again, Yuvraj stands tall to defend it to the off side
slightly back of length, around the off stump, holding its line, pushed back down the track
well short of length outside off stump and Kohli gets going with a punch through covers.
fuller in length, just outside the off stump, Kohli presses across to defend to covers.
127.8 kmph bouncer and Kohli allows it sail harmless over his head
full pitched and outside off stump, Kohli opened his bat face and square drove it through cover point
on a length now, again just outside off stump, Kohli dabs it dangerously short of the  slip fielder, trying to get  a single to third man.
full in length and just outside off stump, Yuvraj lets that one skid through to Sangakkara
139.8 kmph teasing delivery just outside off stump, shaping away, Yuvraj shaped to defend before pulling his bat from the line.
even fuller and straight on the middle and off line, Yuvraj drives pleasingly down the ground past the bowler and the startled umpire.
shifts back to the good length, outside off stump and left alone
back of length, coming in towards off stump, pushed down the track
on the off stump line, from a length, Yuvraj doesn't move forward or back, just bends his knee to retain balance and pushes the ball out to covers
loopy full delivery on the middle stump, pushed to short cover
flicked on the off stump line and Kohli leans across to defend
98.5 kph skidder outside off stump and Kohli played for the off break and is beaten
comes forward to push a off break to the on side
fuller, straighter, lunges to jab to silly point
lands on the middle, slides in, defended on the front foot
loose delivery down the leg side and Yuvraj clips it to the fine-leg boundary.
short of length and on the hips, tucked behind square leg for a single
on a length, outside off stump, holding its line, left alone
fuller, shaping in towards the off stump, Kohli presses forward to push it to mid-on
banged in short and Kohli ducks. 97 to win
back of length outside off stump, punched to deep backward point
short and outside off stump, Kohli rocks back to cut to cover point boundary. He latched on to short delivery pretty quickly
fuller, tickled behind square leg for a single.
off break around off and middle, picks it off the wicket, adjusts his wrists to steer to point
googly on the leg stump line, Yuvraj plays the paddle sweep, gets the edge but it falls short of slip

Yuvraj continues to be a sitting duck against Mendis. Done in by that carrom ball again. It landed on a length around middle and off, Yuvraj groped forward and across, front leg landing well across the line and he couldn't get his bat around the front pad in time and the ball cut in to trap him right in front. Dead duck.
lands on a length outside off stump, skids on, Dhoni steers it past slip and to fine third man position
short of length, straightens it outside off, steered to point
short of length, outside off stump, square cut to left of deep point  where Kapugedera makes a good sliding stop
bouncer on the middle and Kohli ducks
short of length and bouncing outside off stump, steered to third man. free hit coming up
banged in short and Dhoni pulls it high in the air and to right of long leg
goes back and across to wrist a punchy dab to third man
short of length, stands up on his toes to play a feisty cut but straight to point

loud shout for lbw as Dhoni is beaten all hands up by a skidder. Going down leg, though. It landed on a length around leg and middle and skidded down to hit the pad. Dhoni got into a bit of tangle there
leans forward to defend to the off side
almost done in by the yorker. Kohli got his bat down in a hurry to jab it out.
Kohli responds by going down on his knee to swing the off break over short midwicket fielder .
loopy delivery on the middle, he stays adjacent to the line, taking care not to press his front foot too much across and drives to mid-off
quicker, full, driven to long-on for a single
from round the stumps, doosra on the leg and middle line, Kohli leans forward to defend
flatter, quicker off break on the middle and leg, misses the flick and strikes the pad
edged to third man boundary. Flighted off break outside off, Kohli went for the off drive and got a thick profitable edge
quicker topspinner on the middle, still from round the stumps, Kohli goes back to defend
gets on to the front foot to defend the off break on the off stump line
flighted off break on the middle, wristed to square leg for a single
slightly short of length, skids on, Kohli opens his stance up to pull but the ball hurries on and so the pull shot goes to long-on
beaten outside off stump. The quick carrom ball from around the off stump, Dhoni lunges to push inside the line
even fuller, dug out by Dhoni
skids on straight on the middle from short of length, Dhoni backs away and has to pull out his cut shot in a hurry, single to deep point
slower flighted loopy delivery on the middle, stretches forward, waits before working it to short midwicket. Good ball and well played.
the googly but too full and is driven to mid-off
full in length, outside off stump, Dhoni stays back to force it to deep point
full pitched outside off , a tad slower, early into the drive and mistimes it to covers
back of length, on the leg and middle line, worked to left of short midwicket where Mendis makes a diving stop

Kohli throws his wicket away with a loose drive to extra cover fielder. Full in length and the urge to drive on the up swallows him. He started off in an slightly  iffy manner against the new ball but settled down to play well but he is gone now. he had driven loosely in the second ball of this over but it had not gone in the air but this time a similar ball has fetched his wicket
slanting across Rohit who lets it go through to Sangakkkara

Double strike from Tushara and I was wondering whether he had come on just  to facilitate the change of ends for the spinners! It landed on the leg stump line, moved in with the left-armer's angle, Rohit was late on the defensive prod - a waft across the line - and was struck in front of the middle and leg above the knee roll. Like Jayasuriya's dismissal. Virtual eye suggests it would hit the top of the leg and middle.
flighted off break, turned to the on side
goes on the back foot to defend
doosra from short of length, goes back to steer to short third man region
full and outside off stump, steered through cover point
from over the stumps, quicker off break, turned to the on side .
slower off break, defended to the on side
full in length outside off stump, square driven to deep point region
stays back to punch to wide mid-off for couple of runs
down the leg side, glanced  past the diving Sanga to the boundary
shifts his line to the off and middle, full, defended down the track
leans forward to drive to mid-off
short of length, on the middle stump line, Dhoni goes back to tuck it to vacant space near the square leg. They run hard to come back for the second run.
from round the stumps, the flighted doosra on the middle and leg, Badrinath tries to work it to the on side, gets a leading edge to the off side of the pitch
stays back to defend a topspinner to the off side
leans forward to place the flighted off break to wide midwicket and run two
flighted top spinner on the middle and leg, Badrinath is a touch late in reacting but defends to the on side.
picks the doosra and leans across to defend
works the off break on the middle to wide mid-on region for a single, they think about two before settling for one
slider on the middle, moving towards middle and leg, Badrinath stays back to work it to square leg
lunges forward to defend to short extra cover
loopy full delivery on the leg stump line, tries to whip to the on side and it runs of the boot to the off side.
stretches forward to defend down the track
skidder on the middle stump line, defended on the front foot. Mahela appeals alone from the slip, he must have reckoned it hit the pad first.
gets forward, stays adjacent to the line of the ball, not pressing his front foot across and defends to the off side
goes right back to defend the doosra around the leg stump line to square leg
leans forward to wrist the off break from the off stump line through midwicket and again they run hard to come back for the second run. Murali is not happy.
picks the doosra and steers to cover point for a single
from over the wickets this time, top spinner well outside the off stump, Dhoni thinks about the square slash but lets it go through to Sangakkara
lets rip this ball. Similar one outside off stump, slightly shorter than the previous delivery and Dhoni forces it off the back foot to the deep cover point boundary
fuller, straighter, worked to midwicket
leans forward to defend the off break
around the off stump, googly, Badri was late in picking , played him of the wicket, it flicked the pad outside off and then on to the bat and to backward point
flighted outside off stumpp, Dhoni goes for the big cover drive and is beaten. Dhoni winces at his shot selection.
goes round the stumps and Dhoni tickles it to square leg
fuller, on the middle and leg, driven back to the bowler who mis fields but no damage done
lunges across to turn the off break, from over the wicket, to square leg
flighted off break, still from over the wickets, Badrinath stretches across to defend
goes round the stumps, off break on the middle, stops his front foot movement to wrist it through midwicket
turned to square leg
leans across to square drive for a single
good positive stride out and defends to the off side
on a length around the off stump, steered to point
just short of length outside off stump, guided to backward point
full in length, outside the off stump, left alone
fuller, tailing towards middle and leg, worked behind square leg for a single
short of length, Badrinath hops back, gets on top of the bounce to punch it point
rising delivery outside off stump line, Badrinath gets on top of the bounce to keep it down and to backward point
flighted off break on the middle and off, from over the wickets, turned to backward square leg region and they, again, run very hard to come back for the second run.
on the off stump line, worked to midwicket
floated on the full around the off stump line, driven to mid-off
turns in from short of length, cut to deep point
leans forward to defend and the ball strikes the pad
leans across to wrist the flighted off break to midwicket
banged in short at the body, laps the pull shot to fine leg for another couple of runs
short again, outside off this time, mistimes the cut shot to cover point region
on a length, around the off stump, pushed to covers
banged in short again, outside off stump, Badrinath  hops and goes up and over backward point for couple more
coming in off a length, towards middle and leg, worked past square leg
full in length, around the off stump, driven to mid-off
slip, silly point, backward short leg and short midwicket watch as Badrinath defends a skidder on the middle stump line
googly on the middle and leg, he picks it and leans forward to defend down the track
carrom ball on the middle and off, he leans forward to drive with the full face of the bat back to the bowler on the bounce. the ball bursts of Mendis' finger and hits him on the eye. Ouch.
gets forward to work to short midwicket
the slider outside off stump, Badrinath stretches well forward to defend compactly to the off side
slower, loopy delivery around off stump, Badri waits on the front foot and places it to left of mid-off for a single
backs away to play late and cuts the turning off break to cover point
leans forward to dig out a really full delivery to the on side
leans forward to push to wide mid-off region
quickish off break from outside off, wristed to mid-on. Badrinath set off the run, Dhoni sent him back and he got back in time
turns in from outside off stump, goes back to punch to extra cover

flighted really full outside leg stump, Dhoni tries to go for the vertical sweep, misses and so does Sanga. They run very well to come back for the third run. If it was a bye, as the ump signalled, it should have been wide.
from round the stumps, on the middle stump line, Dhoni leans forward to defend. Two slips in place
on the middle and leg, full, pushed down to long-on for a single.
from wide round the stumps and Badrinath plays a compact looking forward defensive stroke.
quicker skidder from short of length, from that angle, Badrinath goes back to swat it to right of mid-off
pitches well outside the leg stump, comes in to hit the pad.
leans across to defend to the off side
streches well forward to defend down the track
picks the quick doosra, plays late to cut but straight to backward point
leans forward to whip a flighted off break to midwicket
skips down the track to drive to right of mid-off. Direct hit from Fernando. It is referred upstairs. He is home, though.
goes back to jab the doosra to the leg side
rips across a quick off break from short of length, Dhoni goes back to work it to midwicket
banged in short and Badrinath picks his first boundary with a well-timed pull shot. Dhoni has a mid-wicket conference and Badrinath nods
full and outside off stump, Badri stretches across to drive and edges it to his pad

cuts in from around the off stump, Badrinath defends pad and bat close together.Sangkkara appeals for lbw. It did hit the flap of the pad first but perhaps, going over the stumps. Ah, the virtual eye suggests it would have clipped the bail
again cutting in, turned to square leg
leans forward to defend down the track
holds its line outside off stump, steered to left of backward point. Badri thought about the single ...
around the off stump line, defended to the off side . No ball. Free hit coming up
big swing and a miss. It was the slower one outside off and Dhoni had gone through the shot pretty early
Shot! Banged in short and outside off, Dhoni hopped to get on top of the bounce and cut it up and over backward point.
fuller, outside off stump, mistimes a drive to covers
around the off stump, full in length, steered to backward point

Cleaned him up with a fuller length delivery that shaped in. It came in from the full length, from the off stump line, Dhoni went for the drive and edges it to his stumps. Good innings from the captain.
fullish and outside off stump, around 139 kmph, Harbhajan bends his knee to go for a drive but is beaten
short of length, outside off stump, goes back and across to play a late cut to third man
walks down the track, goes for the big swing across the line and edges it to short midwicket
again walks down the track, another big swing, the ball reverses in to hit the edge and on to the boot
goes for the yorker, Harbhajan takes one step out, jabs it past square leg
full in length and outside the off stump, Badri bends his knee to guide it to wide third man for couple of runs
short of length outside off stump, punched to covers. even if he wanted there was no single there!
skids in towards middle and leg, worked to square leg. Slip and silly point in

Mendis strikes with the carrom ball. It drifted in landed on the middle and off, Harbhajan tried to work it to the on side (he will think later why did I do that?) and it cut away to hit the pad in front of off stump.
googly on the middle, Zaheer shapes to defend, goes off the pad to short leg. They appeal for bat pad catch but no bat on it
loopy delivery outside off stump, driven to silly point
off break on the middle and leg line, tickled behind square leg
comes forward to defend a skidder on the off stump.
leans forward to defend a length delivery to the off side
low dipping full toss, guided to covers
gets behind the line of a length delivery to defend
banged in short, holds its line outside off, Zaheer first tried to duck then swayed away
the legcutter slower one, almost a yorker length, on the middle and off line, dug out to the off side
leans across to defend to the off side
skips down the track to wrist to midwicket
flighted off break from round the stumps, turned to long leg for a single
gets the scores level with a push to extra cover

brings up the victory with a drive to extra cover. The series is level. Badrinath pumps his fists, good knock on debut. The hero of the victory, Zaheer Khan, walks off with Badri. It was a very good opening spell from him that put India in this position.
